title: Fishing Planet: Chamaeleon Cruiser Pack
description:
Set off on a 60-day voyage through the rich waters of Noomaa Kuda Atholhu, Maldives! 
Jump aboard the luxurious Chamaeleon Yacht with two heavy-duty trolling setups, a generous supply of lures and baits, and a spacious Tackle Wagon accommodating over 300 items.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Chamaeleon Cruiser Pack
<!--text-->
Set off on a 60-day voyage through the rich waters of Noomaa Kuda Atholhu, Maldives! 

Jump aboard the luxurious Chamaeleon Yacht and take on exclusive missions to unlock different color options for your catamaran. It comes with 5 fishing spots to take your fishing buddies aboard, each with two adjustable rod holders and a high-tech display to keep everyone in the loop about what’s happening on the water. The spacious fish storage keeps your abundant catches fresh while the silent engine makes your trolling extra smooth. 

With two heavy-duty trolling setups from Tsurihito™, a generous supply of lures and baits for your big game fishing, a spacious Tackle Wagon accommodating over 300 items, you'll have all essential fishing gear at your fingertips. 

Take full advantage of your Advanced License and Premium to boost earnings and XP, with 50 Marker and 20 Navigation Buoys included to enhance your journey through pristine tropical waters.


Chamaeleon Cruiser Pack includes:
* 100000 CREDITS
* 100 BAITCOINS
* 60-DAYS PREMIUM
* 50 Marker Buoys
* 100 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots
* 20 Navigational Buoys


FISHING YACHT
* Tsurihito™ Chamaeleon™ Fishing Yacht - Max Speed: 40 kn; Fish Storage: 6610 Lb (3000 kg); Maximum seats: 5; Rod Holders: 10 Adjustable Rod Holders; Length: 52.5 ft (16 m); Width: 26.9 ft (8.2 m); Engine: 2*500 hp, Low engine noise; Echo Sounder: Oem, ElitePro, CircleScanning with Additional Rear Sonar Displays; GPS: Yes; Detailing: Ultra; Max Single Fish Weight: 1430 Lb (650 kg); Fish-Friendly: No


RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Tsurihito™ Kōdo Kage 5' 3" (160) SE - Length: 5' 3" (1.6 m); Lure Weight: 2 4/5–17 Oz (80–475 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 121–243 Lb (55–110 kg); Action: Moderate
* Tsurihito™ MizuJigu 5' 7" (170) SE - Length: 5' 7" (1.7 m); Lure Weight: 1 3/4–12 1/3 Oz (50–350 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 88.2–198 Lb (40–90 kg); Action: Moderate

Reels:
* Tsurihito™ JigokuTen 16000 SE - Ratio: 7.9; Recovery: 51.2" (130 cm); Capacity: Mono 132/330 (1.0/330), Braid 104/800 (0.42/800); Max Drag: 196 Lb; Drag: Front
* Tsurihito™ Jōnin 20000 SE - Ratio: 7; Recovery: 45.3" (115 cm); Capacity: Mono 176/360 (1.2/360), Braid 159/950 (0.46/950); Max Drag: 238 Lb (108 kg); Brake: Magnetic & Centrifugal


TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 2500 yd (2500 m):
ZenLine Braid .0201" (0.51 mm) - Test: 227 Lb (103 kg)
Kaigen Fluoro .0413" (1.05 mm) - Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)
CrystalPower Mono .0472" (1.2 mm) - Test: 234 Lb (106 kg)
OceanPower Mono .049" (1.25 mm) - Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)

* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .051 (1.3) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .051 (1.3) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0571 (1.45) (x16) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 227 Lb (103 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0571 (1.45) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 227 Lb (103 kg)
* TitanGuard Titanium Leader .0197 (0.50) (x15) - Length: 3' 28" (1 m); Test: 157 Lb (71 kg)
* TitanGuard Titanium Leader .0197 (0.50) (x15) - Length: 1' 64" (0.5 m); Test: 157 Lb (71 kg)
* TitanGuard Titanium Leader .0205 (0.52) (x15) - Length: 3' 28" (1 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)
* TitanGuard Titanium Leader .0205 (0.52) (x15) - Length: 1' 64" (0.5 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)

* Stealth Poppers: 6 Oz (170 g), #8/0 (x6); 7 Oz (200 g), #10/0 (x6)
* Head Starter Sinkers: 3 1/2 Oz (100 g) (x3), 4 3/4 Oz (135 g) (x3), 6 Oz (170 g) (x3), 8 15⁄32 Oz (240 g) (x3), 10 37⁄64 Oz (300 g) (x3), 12 11⁄32 Oz (350 g) (x3)
* Livebait Trolling Hooks: #5/0 (x9), #7/0 (x9), #8/0 (x9), #10/0 (x9), #12/0 (x9), #14/0 (x9)
* Trolling Skirt Heads: 6 Oz (170 g) (x6), 7 Oz (198 g) (x6), 9 Oz (255 g) (x6)
* Trolling Skirt Hooks: #6/0 (x9), #7/0 (x9), #8/0 (x9), #10/0 (x9), #12/0 (x9)
* Trolling Skirts: 6.9" (17.5 cm) (x9), 7.8" (20 cm) (x9), 9.8" (25 cm) (x9)
* Triple Hook Pilkers: 7 Oz (200 g), #8/0 (x6); 8 Oz (225 g), #10/0 (x6); 8 13/16 Oz (250 g), #12/0 (x6)
* Plugs: 2 2⁄3 Oz (75 g), #6/0 (x3); 3 Oz (85 g), #8/0 (x3); 5 3/10 Oz (150 g), #10/0 (x3)
* Metallic Plugs: 4 3/8 Oz (125 g), #9/0 (x3); 6 Oz (175 g), #11/0 (x3); 8 13/16 Oz (250 g), #13/0 (x3); 10 9/16 Oz (300 g), #15/0 (x3)
* Trolling Octopuses: 1 1/2 Oz (43 g), #4/0 (x6); 2 1/2 Oz (71 g), #6/0 (x6)
* Glowing Trolling Octopuses: 3 1/2 Oz (100 g), #8/0 (x6); 4 9/16 Oz (130 g), #10/0 (x6); 6 1/3 Oz (180 g), #12/0 (x6); 8 Oz (230 g), #14/0 (x6)
* Trolling Baits: Indian Ocean Squid (x50), Japanese Flying Squid (x50), Large Flying Fish (x50), Small Flying Fish (x50), Split Tail Mullet (x50)

EQUIPMENT
* Tsurihito™ LagoonShell™ Rod Case - Rods: 3; Reels: 4; Lines: 3
* UL-CHUBER Tackle Wagon Quadro Pro - Tackles: 300; Lines: 25; Groundbait Components: 150

FISHING LICENSES (60 days):
* Advanced Maldives License

POND PASSES (60 days):
* NOOMAA KUDA ATHOLHU
